definitions.title: n.[m]
definitions.body: snare, net (si vera l.);—pl. cstr. (Ges § 130 a) [[עַד־אָ֫נׇה תְּשִׂימוּן קִנְחֵי לְמִלִּין]] Job 18:2 how long will ye lay snares for words (catch at words, talk without knowledge)? so Cnstle JDMich and most, but sense strange ; Vrss transl. end, so Thes al. (expl. [[קנחי]] [very dub.] as Aram.), rd. then [[קֵץ]] (with sg.vb., after LXX),Me Bi Siegf Du, and del. [[עַד־אָנׇה]] Du.
